name: Spherify
description:
This NFT will be airdropped to everyone who currently holds (purchased or gifted) any of my NFTs.
This is a way to thank you all those who supported my art during my first 108 days on Hicetnunc.xyz 🧨
The Selfaware idea was conceived around early May 21, when i minted "Mercurian Worm" (70977). Its goal was to create a series of NFTs
which will be able to track data (ownership, time, etc) about their collectors & viewers.
When its development started (later May) hicetnunc.xyz wasn't allowing interactive OBJKTs to connect and use Hicdex.com API.
Also, it wasn't allowed to retrieve the profile avatar images from tzkt.io; although both sites/domains was used by
the platform itself. For those reasons, two different Pull Requests (the way of github saying "Suggest a code change")
were made by me personally. 1) https://github.com/hicetnunc2000/hicetnunc/pull/794 and 2) https://github.com/hicetnunc2000/hicetnunc/pull/820
and gladly both were approved 👏 Last but certainly not least, interactive OBJKTs weren't able to directly tell their OBKJT ID number.
and therefore, in order to obtain certain data about an NFT, developers had to do some hacky-guesswork to code in the correct number.
That was the main challenge to develop the Selfaware framework (and a very exciting one!).
Hicetnunc had eventually implemented a way to retrieve the currently displayed OBJKT ID number, and thus,
hundreds of interactive NFTs are now getting "self-aware" every single day! This is a new breed; and it had just began.
The future is bright, and certainly interactive. ⭕
